sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import headerhalf from '../src/images/header half.svg' import experthalf from '../src/images/expert section.svg' import features from '../src/images/features.svg' import iconspeed from '../src/images/speed-test.svg' import iconsecure from '../src/images/web-security.svg' import iconhour from '../src/images/24-hour.svg' import icondatabase from '../src/images/database-server.svg' import greyimg from '../src/images/grey-img.jpg' import affiliateimg from '../src/images/affiliate.png' import client1 from '../src/images/client 1.jpg' import client2 from '../src/images/client 2.jpg' import client3 from '../src/images/client 3.jpg' import client4 from '../src/images/client 4.jpg' import client5 from '../src/images/client 5.jpg' import client6 from '../src/images/client 6.jpg' import blog1 from '../src/images/blog 1.jpg' import blog2 from '../src/images/blog 2.jpg' import blog3 from '../src/images/blog 3.jpg' import Footer from './Footer' import Card from './Cards' import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; // react Helmet import { Helmet } from 'react-helmet' function Main() { return ( <>
